name: THE KICKBOXER
description:
Play a Police Officer and find the Murder of Officer Volkan, the Murder is hide in a Kickboxing Association and your Experience with Martial Arts is good. Fight to the Top position to find the Murder .
They are many small Scenes like Casino,Shoot and Gain ,Workplace and many more  Suprises and a K.O. Fighting System with 6 Skills default and 4 available dive into a Indie Fight Adventure and be the best Kickboxer.

-fight against 28 fighter in a K.O. System
-use Skills faster than your Opponent and interrupt the Attack of your Opponent
-switch between different Scenes and gain Money or take Credit but watchout
